sql.name: GET_LIBRARY_SQL

sql.name: INSERT_LIBRARYBOOK_SQL

sql.name: INSERT_POSSESSBOOK_SQL

sql.name: LIST_POSSESSBOOK_SQL

sql.name: GET_DBCOUNT_POSSESSBOOK_SQL
